captions.text: - So you were surfing the other day?

- Yeah, the weather was
perfect at the beach.
- Yeah, I've been meaning to go.

- You know, actually Sara, I
don't think they let ghosts

Why don't you put your
hat fully on your head?
You know, at least my name isn't like

Well, your mom doesn't
even go to the beach,

Uh, you wouldn't know if
they let ghosts on the beach
- Wait, what are you talking about?
That wasn't even a good burn.

comments.author: sadia asra

comments.text:
My friend used to use this comeback for literally anything anyone said:
         Example: *people talking about melon* Friend: Jeez. *You're* a 
melon.
(Okay, I doubt he ever said it about melons, but it was that format.)
So one day, he was doing a science project with an actually good student 
named Alyssa, and she was like,
         "So the planet is getting hotter and hotter every day!" And he, 
the friend, was being an ass by just not even doing the project and 
spouting his "comeback" left and right, so he goes,
         "_You're_ getting hotter and hotter every day."

*That was five years ago. We never let him forget it.*﻿
